Class SigningStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.jndn.utils.server.pipeline.SigningStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PipelineStage<net.named_data.jndn.Data,net.named_data.jndn.Data>

    public class SigningStage
extends Object
implements PipelineStage<net.named_data.jndn.Data,net.named_data.jndn.Data>
    As a part of a com.intel.jndn.utils.ServerIn pipeline, this stage will sign a Data packet.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown
